name: Mupple
description:
Mupple is a precision platformer with moderate difficulty where you have to learn with your mistakes and help the charismatic animal characters Bilbo, Frodo and Alex to collect all the fruits and go through stages and biomes to get back home


You can play with 3 different characters:
  • Bilbo, the ninja frog.
  • Frodo, the cat mage.
  • Alex, the axolotl loan shark


Venture into Mupple with:
  • 60 different Levels with various traps
  • 3 Characters with unique visuals
  • Colorful and cute color palette
  • Original soundtrack
  • Various controls: WASD, Arrows or even a controller!!

Hope you enjoy!!
